div.h3: Abstract submission to 47th Congress of the European Society of Paediatric Radiology

p.font: Welcome to the MyReview web-based conference management system! This website is devoted to abstract submissions for the 47th Congress of the European Society Paediatric Radiology: this meeting will be held in Bordeaux, France, from 7th to 11th, June 2010.
As an author, you can submit an abstract for a paper that you intend to present, using the abstract submission interface.
Dear colleague, please read first carefully, and eventually print, these lines.

1) Create an account: See the guidelines. Please enter the information in the specific form to create your account. Note that all the fields are mandatory. You must provide a secure password. Your Email will be used to log in the system. Please note that MyReview always stores and compares email addresses in lowercase. If you have already created an account, or if your Email has been previously be entered in the database as co author of another paper, you will not be allowed to create another account and an error message will appeared: “This email is already used”; In this case, go to the login page, and follow the link “password forgotten”.
2) New submission: Please use the form for your submission.
Title and Abstract: Note that all the fields marked by a '*' are mandatory. The maximum size is 220 words, excluding title. Choose the main topic (one) of your proposition.

List of authors: Enter the list of authors. Important: (i) you must appear in this list (use the "Add me" button to do so), (ii) all the fields are mandatory and (iii) there must be exactly one contact author (s/he will receive the confirmation mail). You can add more than 4 authors.

Additional questions: you have to answer to all, with only one button.
In case of conflict of interest, please give more information in the specific field at the end of the abstract form.
You can submit a poster or oral presentation, accept or not that this last one could be changed into a poster after blind review by the scientific committee.
For your society of reattachment, only one answer. If you are member of several societies, choose the one in relation with your geographic origin.
3) Author console: Your submission can then be accessed in the Author console, checked and modified until the submission deadline.

4) Abstract submission is opened from 1st December, 2009. The deadline is 15th
January, 2010.
